title: FPSystem: Advanced Object Grab
description: See that thing? Pick it up! Hold it like you mean it! Grab any physics object and hold it at the same angle you picked it up! Add a component and specify which way is up and forward!
longDescription:
See that thing? Pick it up! Hold it like you mean it! Grab any physics object and hold it at the same angle you picked it up! Add a direction component and specify which way is up and forward!


Picking up objects has never been easier or felt as good! Pick up with style! Pick up with pizazz! A perfect addition to any first person game where you can interact with the things around you!


Want to hold something upright? Now you can!

Having trouble correctly placing that object with 'This way forward' written on it? Worry no more!

You can do all this and more with FPSystem: Advanced Object Grab!

It even comes with a bonus sawblade blueprint that can impale into any static object! Watch out, the edge is sharp!


Preview Video: Here
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Grab any physics Object!
  •  Keep the orientation of the object you picked up!
  •  Set specific up and forward directions to physics objects when adding a component!
  • Made 100% in blueprint!

Number of Blueprints: 5

Input: Keyboard & Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes
